name: Snake 3D (itch) (GuyMakesStuff)
description:
This Is Basically My Version Of The Old Game "Snake", Except set on a 3D Grid Of Cubes And With Added Twists Like Bombs, Extra Feed That Spawn When You Get A High Score, And Timers For Collecting Each Of Them!

However, There Is Also A "Classic Mode" Without These Twists So You Can Just Play Snake In 3D.

You Also Earn Money Depending On How Much Score You Got In The Last Round, Which You Can Use To Buy Some Cool Skins At The Shop And Customize Your Snake!

Source Code: https://github.com/GuyMakesStuff/Snake3D-Source
